author: RTÉ News
title: Google to publish location data in fight against virus
description: Google will publish location data from its users around the world from today to allow governments to gauge the effectiveness of social distancing measures put in place to combat the Covid-19 pandemic, the tech giant said.
content:
Google will publish location data from its users around the world from today to allow governments to gauge the effectiveness of social distancing measures put in place to combat the Covid-19 pandemic, the tech giant said.
